title: Chelsea's key WSL match against Tottenham tonight postponed
shortDescription: Chelsea Women's key Women's Super League clash against Tottenham Women tonight has been postponed due to a Covid outbreak in the Spurs squad.

title: Gary Neville on 25-man shortlist for Premier League Hall of Fame
shortDescription: The Premier League has announced a shortlist of 25 former players who are eligible to join its Hall of Fame in 2022, with Sky Sports' Gary Neville among the nominees.

title: Kane: England players discussing Qatar statement
shortDescription: Harry Kane says England's players will use their platform at the World Cup to try to improve human rights issues in Qatar.

title: Bale 'ready' for Wales' World Cup play-off | 'Biggest game I've played in'
shortDescription: Gareth Bale has trained with Wales ahead of Thursday's World Cup play-off with Austria in a major boost to Rob Page's side.

title: Two PL clubs monitor Rudiger as Juve lodge interest
shortDescription: Two Premier League clubs are monitoring Antonio Rudiger's contract situation as Juventus firm up their interest in the Chelsea defender.

title: Race for the Premier League assessed: Who is in contention?
shortDescription: We assess the enthralling race for promotion from the Championship to the Premier League.

title: Russia could rival UK and Ireland Euro 2028 bid
shortDescription: Russia has declared an interest in rivalling the UK and Ireland for the right to host Euro 2028 despite its ban from international football.

title: Two PL clubs in touch with Pogba for summer move
shortDescription: Paul Pogba is attracting plenty of interest with Premier League clubs among those keen on his services as his contract at Manchester United winds down this summer.

title: Wales' next big hope spearheading World Cup charge
shortDescription: Brennan Johnson won his first senior cap in November 2020 but having missed out on Wales' Euro 2020 squad last summer, the winger is ready to make up for lost time.

title: Bale and Ramsey: Are the Wales engines ready to motor?
shortDescription: Wales’ pair of Lamborghinis - Gareth Bale and Aaron Ramsey - have been left parked in the garage. Will their engines roar when unleashed in Cardiff?

title: AC Milan closing in on free transfer for Origi
shortDescription: AC Milan are favourites to sign Liverpool striker Divock Origi on a free transfer this summer when his contract expires, according to Sky Italy.

title: Hibernian's Porteous handed four-game ban
shortDescription: Hibs have failed to overturn the red card shown to Ryan Porteous in Saturday's 3-1 defeat against Aberdeen and he will now serve an extended four-match ban.

title: Rapinoe on taking a knee, building courage and importance of LGBTQ+ community
shortDescription: Megan Rapinoe joins Chelsea's Pernille Harder and Magda Eriksson to talk about her motivations and the comfort she finds within the LGBTQ+ community

title: Is Xhaka harshly treated by refs?
shortDescription: Granit Xhaka's yellow card in Arsenal's 1-0 win over Aston Villa angered fans who feel he is treated harshly by officials but what do the stats say?

title: Pogba: I've suffered depression | 'We're not superheroes'
shortDescription: Paul Pogba has opened up about experiencing depression "several times" during his career and says footballers' mental health must be discussed more.

title: Which Championship players are out of contract this summer?
shortDescription: A comprehensive list of every Sky Bet Championship player whose contract is currently set to expire on June 30 2022.

title: Alisson pips Ronaldo in star-studded form chart
shortDescription: Who is red-hot in the Premier League right now? Sky Sports ranks every player over the last five matchdays...

title: Man Utd hold 'positive' talks with Ajax boss Ten Hag
shortDescription: Manchester United held "positive" talks with Erik ten Hag on Monday - with the club hierarchy thought to be impressed by his vision and philosophy.

title: Lewington: Rhythm, management and why Shilton's record is safe
shortDescription: MK Dons captain Dean Lewington on the role of rhythm in his career, management and why Peter Shilton's record of 1,005 Football League appearances is not in his sights.

title: Rooney and Vieira inducted into Premier League Hall of Fame
shortDescription: Wayne Rooney and Patrick Vieira have become the latest players to be inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame.
